Class AbstractMessageTask<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.impl.protocol.task.AbstractMessageTask<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SecureRequest, MessageTask, PartitionSpecificRunnable, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAllPartitionsMessageTask, AbstractCallableMessageTask, AbstractInvocationMessageTask, AbstractMapReduceTask, AbstractMultiTargetMessageTask, AbstractPartitionMessageTask, NoSuchMessageTask

extends Object
implements MessageTask, SecureRequest
    Base Message task

        public int getPartitionId()
